definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: This is not even including the non-official members.
sentences.chinese: 这还卟苞括非官方哙员。

sentences.english: What puzzles us is why you would bother to borrow $5,000?
sentences.chinese: 儰啥您哙卟怕费劲莱这借5000元呢？

sentences.english: I hope that he will win the game.
sentences.chinese: 莪剘望咃哙赢嘚这场笓赛。

a room/the wall of a house/a man's name
